articles.title: DPRK Refutes Misinformation Spread by Chosun Ilbo
articles.content:
DPRK Refutes Misinformation Spread by Chosun Ilbo
 Pyongyang July 19 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) on Friday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA refuting the misinformation released by Chosun Ilbo, anti-DPRK conspiratorial paper, to hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership, at the prodding of the south Korean puppet regime:
					 The whole country is now alive with preparations to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War as a grand festival of victors and the world's attention is focused on Pyongyang. 
					
					 It is against this backdrop that Chosun Ilbo dared float sheer misinformation hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 On July 18 the reptile newspaper released such nonsensical story that Pyongyang is going to invite Western media for interviews on the occasion of the diamond jubilee and asking them to pay a million dollars for them.
					
					 In order to make its false story sound plausible, the paper made clumsy excuses that "it is based on a source well informed of the situation inside the north" and the like.
					
					 This is nothing but poor trumpeting which can be made only by base and wicked hack journalists who prolong their remaining days through anti-DPRK smear campaign after being reduced to waiting maids for those in power.
					
					 This is no more than a last-ditch shrilling cry of those taken aback by the might of the DPRK in which all service personnel and people are glorifying the proud history of the victory in the war, working fresh  miracles and bringing about a leap forward, united as one around the great leader. 
					
					 As far as Chosun Ilbo is concerned, it had long been derided and censured by world people for its ill fame as the paper speaking for the ultra-right conservatives.
					
					 Only such cock-and-bull story can be heard from those insane guys keen on hatching plots against the DPRK. 
					
					 Nobody in the world would lend an ear to the rubbish told by such paper. 
					
					 The DPRK will certainly settle accounts with those defamers of the dignity of its supreme leadership and the anti-DPRK tricksters will have to pay a dear price for their crimes.
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean puppet regime may sling mud at the DPRK through such hack papers as Chosun Ilbo, it will exalt its dignity and might more strikingly along with the fireworks to be displayed on the war victory day.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Visits Hospitals under Construction
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Visits Hospitals under Construction 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the children's hospital and dental hospital under construction.
					 He went round several places of the construction sites and held a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting underscored the need to increase the speed of construction and improve its quality true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to build hospitals to be proud of and impeccable in all aspects.
					
					 It called on the Cabinet, the State Planning Commission, ministries and national institutions to satisfactorily supply building materials needed for the construction projects.
					
					 The premier acquainted himself with the construction of the Mushroom Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and the Munsu Wading Pool. He encouraged the soldier-builders registering achievements despite unfavorable conditions.
					
					 He acquainted himself in detail with the progress made in the construction and called on the relative units to keep the supply of building materials on a par with the construction.

articles.title: DPRK Jurists Society Disclose U.S. Wartime Crimes
articles.content:
DPRK Jurists Society Disclose U.S. Wartime Crimes 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Jurists Society of the DPRK issued a memorandum disclosing crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists during the Korean war.
					 The memorandum released Friday cited facts to prove that the U.S., chief culprit of aggression and war, moved to cover up its nature as the provoker of the war and draw its aggression troops and armies of its satellite countries into the war.
					
					 The UN Security Council's "resolution" on the Korean war was illegal as it was not based on investigation into truth about the disputes, the memorandum said, and went on:
					
					 The "resolution" was adopted in contravention of article 32 of the UN Charter which calls for having parties to the disputes present in discussing problems and paragraph 3 of article 27 of UN Charter which provides that a UNSC resolution shall be valid by approval votes of members of the council (there were seven at that time) including approval by all permanent members.
					
					 The U.S. committed atrocities in breach of war legislation and custom.
					
					 During the war the U.S. dropped 428,000 plus bombs over Pyongyang on 1 400 occasions, destroying industrial establishments, education, health and public service facilities and dwelling houses and killing peaceable citizens.
					
					 100 bombers of the U.S. army that flew into the sky above Sinuiju on November 8, 1950 dropped bombs, leveling 8 900 houses, killing over 9,000 and wounding 3,155.
					
					 On September 16, 1950 when the U.S. forces landed on Inchon, they killed more than 1,300 civilians and arrested or killed over 75 000 patriots in Seoul alone.
					
					 Little over one year into the war, the U.S. massacred one million civilians in south Korea.
					
					 In areas in the northern half of Korea which were put under its temporary control the U.S. buried alive, burned to death or buried at rivers and seas a broad segment of innocent people including officials of party and power organs and working people's organizations, workers, farmers, office workers, youth and students and even religionists regardless of their sex and age. The U.S. troops even used wood-cuter as a killing tool and skinned or dismembered them to death.
					
					 The U.S. raised A-bomb scare to carry people to south Korea but on the way killed over 4,000 in the makeshift bridge over ther River Taedong and on the frozen River Taedong and more than 30,000 in Sariwon-Haeju road.
					
					 When retreating from the northern areas which were under their temporary control from the end of 1950, the U.S. imperialist aggressors spread all kinds of infectious viruses including smallpox, making the areas plagued with infectious diseases. The number of cases who contracted infectious diseases rapidly increased to reach 3 500 in April 1951 10 percent out of whom ended up in death.
					
					 From early January to March 1952, the U.S. dropped all kinds of germ bombs on 169 areas in the northern half of Korea including highlands, coastal areas and mountainous areas a total of 804 times.
					
					 In May 1952, the U.S. flew hundreds of planes to sky over the DPRK every day and a quarter of them dropped germ bombs. The highest number of flights reached over 480 a day.
					
					 The use of poisonous gas by the U.S. began with its indiscriminate bombing on Nampho on May 6, 1951.
					
					 1,379 people died due to the poisonous gas in Nampho.
					
					 There are other examples proving the atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists in wanton violation of war legislation and custom during the Korean war. They were not accidental ones by individual American soldiers but hideous and huge crimes committed in an organized and planned way under the U.S. government policy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Boosting DPRK-Russia Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Boosting DPRK-Russia Relations
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates an article to the 13th anniversary of the DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration.
					 V. V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, was the first head of state of Russia to visit the DPRK in July, Juche 89 (2000) at the invitation of general secretary Kim Jong Il. The DPRK-Russia summit was held and the DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration was adopted during the visit.
					
					 The adoption of the joint declaration marked an important occasion in laying a solid foundation for comprehensively developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have developed on a high level since the adoption of the joint declaration.
					
					 The Russian people are working hard to achieve social stability and economic development and promote the security and interests of the country under the leadership of President V. V. Putin and are registering remarkable achievements in the work to build powerful Russia.
					
					 Russia is opposed to hegemonic and arbitrary policies in the international arena and is calling for establishing multipolorization of the world and a new and fair international order.
					
					 Such efforts of Russia will contribute to preventing new arms race and militarization of space and defending world peace and security.
					
					 To boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Russia as required by the new century is in line with the desires and fundamental interests of the two peoples and is of weighty significance in ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever make positive efforts to boost the DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative relations in the spirit of the DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Establishing Peace Mechanism on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Establishing Peace Mechanism on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- To defuse tensions on the Korean Peninsula and replace the armistice system by a peace one is a pressing task for ensuring durable peace, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Friday.
					 The DPRK has advanced proposals of epochal significance on establishing peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula and made every possible effort to carry them out while exercising maximum patience and self-restraint, the article says, and goes on: 
					
					 But the U.S. and south Korean authorities, seized with their ambition for invading the DPRK, have doggedly stood in the way of the Korean nation in its struggle for durable peace on the peninsula, hobbling the efforts for establishing peace mechanism. 
					
					 The fact proves that to end the ceasefire and build lasting peace mechanism is essential for fundamentally removing the danger of war from the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S., regarding the peninsula with great geo-political significance as a vantage area for laying military siege to restrain the emergence of big powers which can be match to it in the Asia-Pacific region, is opposed to signing a peace treaty with the DPRK in a bid to invent a pretext for activating military intervention in the region.
					
					 The U.S. is claiming that the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defense is a factor of aggravating the regional situation but it is nothing but a cynical ploy to cover up its hostile policy toward the DPRK and the aggressive nature of its Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 As the U.S. and the south Korean regime are to fully blame for the total nullification of the armistice agreement which existed for mere form's sake, they are duty-bound to establish peace mechanism on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK will never tolerate the moves of the belligerent forces escalating military confrontation and tensions and hindering the establishment of durable peace mechanism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Statue Erected at Kim Jong Il University of People's Security
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Statue Erected at Kim Jong Il University of People's Security
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The statue of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was erected on the campus of Kim Jong Il University of People's Security.
					 This realized the greatest desire of the teachers and students of the university and all public security men and servicepersons of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					
					 The statue depicts smiling Kim Jong Il in a plain wadded dress who paid endless visits to forefront units for defending the country and construction sites, wisely leading all service personnel and people to win a final victory. 
					
					 A ceremony of unveiling the statue took place on July 19.
					
					 The statue was unveiled by Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and rector of the university Kim Chang Il.
					
					 Placed before the statue was a floral basket in the name of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before it then were floral baskets in the joint name of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet and in the joint name of the Ministry of People's Security and the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					
					 All the participants paid tribute to the statue in the humblest reverence.
					
					 Minister of People's Security Choe Pu Il in his address noted that the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il provided a guarantee for making it possible for the university to creditably perform its mission and duty as a pedigree institution training backbone elements preserving its revolutionary character and firmly protecting the security of the social system, the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks and the life and properties of the people in each grim period.
					
					 He said that only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people under the leadership of the great Songun commander, calling on everybody to get united close around Kim Jong Un to turn out in the struggle to achieve a final victory in the showdown with the U.S. and building a thriving nation.
					
					 Then guards of honor of the Ground Force, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards marched past the statue.

articles.title: Library in Pyongyang Medical College Opens
articles.content:
Library in Pyongyang Medical College Opens
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A modern library sprang up in Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University.
					 General secretary Kim Jong Il gave precious instructions to serve as guidelines for the education of rising generation and scientific research and called for building a modern library at the college when he visited it in November, Juche 99 (2010).
					
					 He took measures to form a construction force and supply materials and equipment and clarified issues arising in hastening the construction.
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un settled the issues arising in the construction and took all measures.
					
					 The officials and builders pushed forward the project, true to the behest of Kim Jong Il and intention of Kim Jong Un, and successfully completed the project as required by the new century. 
					
					 The library provides the teachers and students with conditions and data base for breaking through the cutting edge in education, scientific research and preventive and curative medical care. It also helps the college change its appearance as a pedigree institution for training personnel in the nation's field of medial science and technology.
					
					 All facilities for acquiring ultra-modern science and technology are available in the library including e-reading, multi-media reading, tele-education and academic exchange rooms.
					
					 An opening ceremony of the library took place on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, builders, teachers and students of the college.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and her family Friday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to them.
					 They laid a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them with boundless reverence for the peerlessly great men who had taken warm care of them with a strong sense of revolutionary obligation.
					
					 They arrived here Friday.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Avia Baatarhuyag, director general of the Mongolian News Agency Montsame, flew back on Friday.
					 The delegation of the Architects Union of Korea headed by Vice-Chairman Sim Yong Hak returned home on the same day after visiting China.

articles.title: Advisor to Mongolian President Flies Back
articles.content:
Advisor to Mongolian President Flies Back
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Lundeg Purevsuren, national security and foreign policy advisor to the president of Mongolia, and his party flew back on Friday.

articles.title: Advisor to Mongolian President Visits Various Places
articles.content:
Advisor to Mongolian President Visits Various Places
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Lundeg Purevsuren, national security and foreign policy advisor to the president of Mongolia, and his party visited the Mansudae Art Studio.
					 They went round various studio rooms.
					
					 They also visited the Majon Beach, a scenic spot on the East Sea of Korea.

articles.title: EP Delegation Flies Back
articles.content:
EP Delegation Flies Back
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The delegation for relations with the Korean Peninsula of the European Parliament led by Chairman Herbert Reul flew back on Friday.

articles.title: Japanese Women's Society Instrumental to Japan's Aggression War
articles.content:
Japanese Women's Society Instrumental to Japan's Aggression War 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Japan inflicted enormous misfortunes upon the Korean women during its colonial rule over Korea.
					 It was well illustrated by the "monument to the dedication made by the Pyongyang branch of the women's society for national defence of Imperial Japan" discovered on Moran Hill in Pyongyang in July 2005.
					
					 The "monument", 2.5 meters high, 25cm wide and 25cm thick, was erected in May 1942 in praise of "patriotism" displayed by the Japanese women in the branch for the interests of Japan.
					
					 The women's society was a reactionary organization, the members of which were the wives of Japanese aggression army officers.
					
					 The "women's society for national defence" was first organized in the Osaka Division and the "women's society for national defence of Imperial Japan" was organized in Tokyo in October 1932 under the aegis of military ministers.
					
					 Later, the society had its branches in Korea, China, Sakhalin, the South Sea Islands, etc.
					
					 It played a noticeable role in Japan's aggression of the Asian Continent.
					
					 15 branches were active in Hwanghae and Phyongan provinces, under which there were 175 sub-branches.
					
					 Their activities were aimed at covering up the true colors of Japan's fascist repressive policy and dampening people's resistance against Japan in colonized countries.
					
					 They actively carried on propaganda activities among Korean women to make them serve the Japanese army as sexual slaves.
					
					 The fact gives a glimpse of the crimes of the society.

articles.title: Military Dictator's Huge Assets Found in His House
articles.content:
Military Dictator's Huge Assets Found in His House
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News, huge assets were found in houses and offices of former military dictator Chun Doo Hwan and his family members  on July 16 in the course of a search operation.
					 People of various circles demanded traitor Chun return the illicit money and properties he had accumulated by use of power and through scandals during the tenure of his office but he has so far refused to comply with collection, insisting that he had no assets.
					
					 The search operation resulted in the discovery of more than 100 artifacts including art and ceramic works worth a colossal sum of money.
					
					 An old art work worth more than a hundred million won was found in Chun's residence, in particular.
					
					 This gave the lie to his assertion that he had just 290,000 won in his bank account.

articles.title: Peace March against Naval Base Construction Declared
articles.content:
Peace March against Naval Base Construction Declared
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The peace march group for life of Kangjong village in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul  on Wednesday at which it declared it would stage a peace march in protest against the construction of the Jeju naval base.
					 In a press release the march group condemned the illegal construction of the base.
					
					 The group recalled that people from all walks life aspiring after peace have staged strenuous actions in protest against the construction of the military base at Kangjong village on Jeju Province.
					
					 It has been confirmed that the naval base is now under construction according to the standard required by the U.S. Navy, the group noted, accusing the "government" of deceiving the people, asserting that it is civilian-oriented.
					
					 It assailed the present regime for walking away and detaining Kangjong villagers and activists for their protest actions and wantonly encroaching upon their human rights.
					
					 Neither violence nor pressure can ever quell resistance and stem the trend towards peace and justice, the group held.
					
					 The people of all social standings will never give up their protest actions but wage a dynamic action for peace, it said.
					
					 It stressed that through the six-day march it would let the world know that the Kangjong village would rise up again.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Landing Exercise for Surprise Attack
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Landing Exercise for Surprise Attack
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Hukryong Unit of the south Korean puppet marine corps Wednesday started a landing exercise for surprise attack on the DPRK on Paekryong Island, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The warmongers are staging the frantic north-targeted war exercise for three days including a drill for formation of forces and long-distance naval maneuver and a drill for infiltrating into land, claiming that it is necessary to land on enemy's coasts by using waters for maneuverability in contingency.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Release Declaration on Situation
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Release Declaration on Situation
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Students of over 460 middle and high schools across south Korea released a declaration of youth and students on the situation after holding a press conference in Seoul on Wednesday.
					 The declaration said the interference of the Intelligence Service (IS) in the election and police illegal acts of trying to cover it up were violation of democracy.
					
					 Those related to the crime deserve punishment, it stressed.
					
					 The chief executive of south Korea and the director of the IS should hold responsibilities, it urged.
					
					 It strongly demanded that the "government" and the "National Assembly" thoroughly investigate the crimes committed by the IS and police.
					
					 An opinion poll conducted among youth and students across south Korea from July 3 to 15 was made public at the press conference.
					
					 According to it, 93.6 percent of the respondents said the IS committed illegal acts to build up public opinion in favor of the candidate from the ruling party.
					
					 75.3 percent of the respondents said that the IS's act of opening to public the minutes of the north-south summit is aimed to cover up its crime and check the people's candlelight actions and release of declaration on the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean IS's Interference in Election Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean IS's Interference in Election Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- 111 dramatists of south Korea published a declaration on the situation in Seoul on Monday in protest against the political operation of the Intelligence Service (IS) and its interference in the election.
					 In the declaration they said the IS interfered in the election in an organized way under the command of its bosses and the investigation into the case was played down at the instruction of the director of the Seoul District Police Agency, adding this is an act of violating democracy.
					
					 The IS committed another illegal act of opening to public the minutes of the south-north summit in a bid to cover up its illegal interference in the election, they charged.
					
					 They urged the present chief executive to apologize for this at once, make a thorough investigation into those involved in the case and punish them.

articles.title: Seminars on Feats Kim Il Sung Performed by Winning Victory in War Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Feats Kim Il Sung Performed by Winning Victory in War Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the feats President Kim Il Sung performed by winning a victory in the war were held in Romania, Austria and Peru on July 8 and 10.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said that the Korean people could win a brilliant victory in the fierce Fatherland Liberation War thanks to the outstanding military idea and war methods of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Thomas Losh, chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, said that the U.S. hurled huge forces into the Korean war but was compelled to sign the Armistice Agreement little short of a paper of surrender on July 27, 1953.
					
					 He praised the Korean people for defeating the U.S. imperialists by displaying matchless bravery and popular heroism, rallied close around Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly build a thriving socialist nation as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il, he noted.
					
					 Guillermo Alcazar Ribera, chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, lauded Kim Il Sung as iron-willed commander who wisely led the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War and symbol of eternal victory in the struggle against imperialism and the U.S.
					
					 July 27 is the anniversary of great victory the world anti-imperialist independent forces should celebrate with the Korean people, he noted.
					
					 The DPRK will remain an impregnable socialist fortress and win the second and third victory in the fight against U.S. imperialism thanks to Kim Jong Un and the line set forth by him on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force, he added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Foreign Organizations 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries posted on their websites special write-ups between July 5 and 8 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Kim Il Sung, holding high banner of independence" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President and his photos.
					
					 The article praised him for performing undying feats for the era and history, holding high the banner of independence.
					
					 When the socialist system collapsed in different countries, only the DPRK remained unshaken, the article said, and went on:
					
					 He worked heart and soul to achieve the cause of global independence.
					
					 He gave overall answers to the principled issues arising in realizing the human cause of independence. He also sincerely helped the peoples of other countries in their struggle for independence against imperialism.
					
					 He positively supported the Chinese revolution and defended the Soviet Union with arms during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to liberate Korea. Afterwards, he gave disinterested assistance to different countries and nations in their struggle against imperialism.
					
					 His disinterested support and encouragement are fully recorded in the historic victories of the struggle of the peoples of many countries for independence against imperialism.
					
					 The banner of independence held high by him is serving as an engine instilling great strength and courage not only into the Korean people but also into the world progressives.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Front of France and the Romanian Workers' Association posted articles on his personality as a great man and the feats he performed for national reunification.

articles.title: UK Organizations Praise Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
UK Organizations Praise Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on July 12 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The DPRK could defeat the formidable U.S. imperialists and their followers in the Fatherland Liberation War thanks to the Juche-based military idea and outstanding strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and the indomitable fighting spirit of the army and people who remained true to his leadership, the statement said.
					
					 There continued a fierce confrontation with imperialism in Korea even after the ceasefire, it noted, and went on:
					
					 General secretary Kim Jong Il wisely steered the nuclear standoff between the DPRK and the U.S. and the struggle for defending socialism with his original Songun politics, ushering in an era of a new victory in the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S.
					
					 The leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, is the life and soul of the KPA and the banner of its victory.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who made a long journey of Songun from long ago together with Kim Jong Il, has strengthened the KPA into a reliable scout party and strong mainstay of the Songun revolution and made the DPRK demonstrate its might as a military power.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite a new war in Korea, they will have to sign a paper of surrender, not an armistice agreement.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo, Handicraft Exhibitions Held in Mexico, Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo, Handicraft Exhibitions Held in Mexico, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were held between July 1 and 5 in Mexico and Nigeria on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed in the exhibitions were photos of Kim Il Sung, general secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, books and photos of the army and people of the DPRK building a thriving socialist nation and handiworks associated with wisdom and talents of Koreans.
					
					 The chairman of the C.C., the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico praised Kim Il Sung as the great father of the Korean nation and founder of socialist Korea who liberated the country and built a socialist power centred on the popular masses in Korea and an invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 The far-sighted idea and noble desire of Kim Il Sung are being translated into reality thanks to Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 The director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said that the solid political, military and economic foundation laid by Kim Il Sung all his life is serving as an engine guaranteeing the DPRK's one victory after another, adding that he is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Austrian Organization Supports Korean People's Struggle against U.S.
articles.content:
Austrian Organization Supports Korean People's Struggle against U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna issued a bulletin on July 10 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The bulletin carried an article titled "On the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists instigated the south Korean puppet forces to invade the DPRK on June 25, 1950.
					
					 The Korean People's Army beat back the invaders through counterattack, liberating a vast area of the southern half of Korea in a short span of time under the leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The U.S. mobilized their satellites for the war of aggression and used even germ weapons but was compelled to surrender before the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime are still working hard to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 All the Korean people are struggling against the moves of the war servants, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is fully embodying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, provides a guarantee for defending the sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: Dismantlement of "UN Command" in S. Korea Demanded by British Organization
articles.content:
Dismantlement of "UN Command" in S. Korea Demanded by British Organization 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a statement on July 2 in demand of the dismantlement of the "UN Command".
					 The statement supported the DPRK's stand demanding the dismantlement of the "UN Command".
					
					 The "UN Command" in south Korea is a leftover of the Cold War and a tool for enforcing the U.S. neo-colonialist policy towards south Korea and invading the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 In view of these facts the "UN Command" has no ground whatsoever to remain in south Korea.
					
					 It is a tool for war cooked up by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 It poses a grave threat not only to the DPRK but to peace in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. has persistently worked to stifle the DPRK for 60 years since the conclusion of the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					 The U.S. should conclude a durable peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 Dismantle the "UN Command" in south Korea at once!

articles.title: UK Organizations Support Korean People's Cause of National Reunification
articles.content:
UK Organizations Support Korean People's Cause of National Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on July 4, the 41st anniversary of a joint statement adopted between the north and the south of Korea.
					 The July 4 joint statement is a brilliant fruition of President Kim Il Sung's independent, patriotic idea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The President clarified the stand long ago that the DPRK would meet with all political parties, public organizations and individuals of south Korea anytime to negotiate the issue of Korea's reunification with them in order to improve the north-south relations and achieve the reunification of the nation. This shows his unbounded magnanimity and ardent patriotic will.
					
					 But no sooner had the July 4 joint statement been published than the Park Chung-Hee fascist junta of south Korea, which had been doggedly opposed to the reunification of the country at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists, trampled down the joint statement, arrested and suppressed many pro-reunification patriots and, at same time, escalated the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The present ruling forces of south Korea are obstructing the reunification of Korea, escalating the north-south relations and cracking down on pro-reunification patriots and progressives.
					
					 The fundamental principles of Korea's reunification clarified in the July 4 joint statement are fully embodied in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will reunify the country without fail on the principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Celebration Events Held Abroad
articles.content:
Celebration Events Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Colorful events took place in different countries to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They included a meeting in Poland and film shows in Romania and Nigeria on July 9 and 12.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, general secretary Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un in their revolutionary activities.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films including "The U.S. Imperialist Aggressors Are Provokers of the Korean War", part 1 of "Fatherland Liberation War", and "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army said that strengthening of the DPRK's nuclear forces was a natural option in recognition of the nuclear threat from the U.S. and it is aimed to prevent a war and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is the truth of history that deterrent equivalent to that of the enemy is essential for defending one's idea and option, he noted, adding the just struggle of the Korean people would surely win a victory.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Poland said the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War is common holiday of the peoples in the world.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union said that the U.S. provoked a war against the young DPRK by mobilizing huge troops.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK could win a victory in three years of the bloody war with the U.S., totally thanks to Kim Il Sung's original military idea, strategies and tactics and war methods.
					
					 Six decades on, the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK still remains unchanged. The U.S. should rescind its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We are convinced that the army and people of the DPRK would surely win a final victory in confrontation with the U.S. by inheriting the ever-victorious history and traditions under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Website of UK Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Website of UK Organization
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on July 12 posted on its website President Kim Il Sung's famous work "Go All Out for Victory in the War".
					 The work, a radio speech made by him to all the Korean people on June 26, Juche 39 (1950), the day after the start of the Korean war, deals with the efforts of the DPRK government to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the aim of the war of aggression ignited by the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique. Noting that the war waged by the Korean people is a just war for the reunification and independence of the country and its freedom and democracy, it indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to win a final victory in the war.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Russia, Vietnam, Uganda, Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Russia, Vietnam, Uganda, Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars, remembrance meetings and lectures were held in Russia, Vietnam, Uganda and Democratic Congo on July 8 and 9 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were works of the President and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Public Organization "Militant Friendship" of Russia praised Kim Il Sung as the great father who devoted his all to the sacred cause for the freedom and independence of Korea and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The war veterans of Russia are convinced that the Korean people will successfully realize the desire of Kim Il Sung under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association said the Vietnamese people would always remember the great feats Kim Il Sung performed for the Korean revolution and the development of the bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted Kim Il Sung is being deeply revered by progressive mankind as the eternal sun of Juche. He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung provided the great guiding idea of the cause of independence by founding the Juche idea.
					
					 The founding of the Juche idea ushered in a new era of history, the era of independence in which the popular masses are independently and creatively hewing out the road of revolution as the masters of the world and their own destiny.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who ushered in the era of independence and devoted his all to the victorious advance of the human cause of independence, is always alive in the hearts of the world people.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo praised Kim Il Sung for materially and morally supporting and encouraging the peoples of developing countries including Africa in their struggle for independence, liberation and the building of new society.

articles.title: CRPP condena demagogia de Chosun Ilbo del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP condena demagogia de Chosun Ilbo del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, las autoridades surcoreanas instigaron al periodico Chosun Ilbo, habituado a difamar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, a publicar una desinformacion vinculada con la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					 Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio el dia 19 la siguiente respuesta a la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea:
					
					 Ahora todo el pais (RPDC) esta enfrascado en los preparativos para celebrar el 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria como gran festival de triunfadores y se enfoca en la RPDC la atencion de todo el mundo.
					
					 En estos tiempos, el periodico titere surcoreano Chosun Ilbo, enviciado en conspiracion y falsificacion, divulga atrevidamente un rumor infundado.
					
					 Especificamente, el dia 18, ese rotativo transmitio una desinformacion que vulnera la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, segun la cual esta invito a Pyongyang los medios de prensa del Occidente con motivo del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la guerra coreana y prepara la entrevista de prensa pidiendo un millon de dolares como recompensa.
					
					 Para atribuir cierto "credito" a su embuste, anadio que "brindo esa noticia una fuente versada en la situacion interior del Norte de Corea".
					
					 Esto resulta una demagogia que se les puede ocurrir solo a los plumiferos pagados que mantienen su sucia vida fomentando el enfrentamiento con la RPDC como sirvientas del poder.
					
					 Igualmente, significa el gemido agonico de los atemorizados ante el poderio de la RPDC donde todos los militares y civiles, unidos compactamente en torno a su gran Dirigente, crean nuevos milagros y auge continuando la historia de victoria en la guerra.
					
					 Desde hace mucho tiempo, Chosun Ilbo es burlado y condenado por todo el mundo por haber ganado la mala fama de portavoz de fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas y medio de conspiracion anti-RPDC.
					
					 Nadie hara caso a la chismografia de ese medio venal.
					
					 Pero, sera liquidado sin falta el crimen de haber insultado la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y los conspiradores anti-RPDC tendran que pagarlo muy caro.
					
					 A pesar de la difamacion de la banda titere surcoreana que moviliza para ese fin los medios de prensa venales como Chosun Ilbo, la RPDC se vera mas digna y poderosa junto con los fuegos artificiales que estremeceran el mundo festejando la victoria del 27 de julio.

articles.title: AJC revela violaciones de derecho internacional por EE.UU. en pasada guerra coreana
articles.content:
AJC revela violaciones de derecho internacional por EE.UU. en pasada guerra coreana
 Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario de la victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, la Asociacion de Juristas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 19 un memorando para revelar los crimenes cometidos durante la pasada guerra coreana (1950-1953) por el imperialismo norteamericano, caudillo de agresion y guerra.
					 El documento cito los hechos que revelan lo que hizo Estados Unidos para encubrir su naturaleza de provocador de guerra e introducir en la guerra coreana sus tropas agresoras y los mercenarios de paises satelites.
					
					 Insistio en que la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU" inventada por EE.UU. en relacion con la guerra coreana es la ilegal que fue fabricada a base de datos fraudulentos sin abrir siquiera la investigacion sobre la causa de conflicto.
					
					 Prosiguio que esa "resolucion" no observo el articulo 32 de la Carta de la ONU que estipula la participacion del pais en conflicto en el debate de su problema ni la clausula 3 del articulo 27 que establece que las resoluciones del Consejo de Seguridad sobre todos los problemas deben ser aprobadas por la votacion a favor de los paises miembros (7 en aquel entonces), inclusive todos los miembros permanentes.
					
					 El documento puso al desnudo las barbaridades de EE.UU. que violaron la ley y las costumbres de guerra durante la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					 Durante la guerra, el imperialismo norteamericano arrojo en mas de mil 400 ocasiones mas de 428 mil bombas contra la ciudad de Pyongyang destruyendo todas las fabricas, empresas, instituciones de educacion, salud publica y servicio publico y las viviendas y asesinando a los inocentes habitantes pacificos, recordo el documento y continuo:
					
					 El 8 de noviembre de 1950, cien bombarderos estadounidenses realizaron un ataque aereo contra la ciudad de Sinuiju en que resultaron destruidas 8 mil 900 viviendas, asesinados mas de 9 mil ciudadanos y heridos 3 mil 155.
					
					 El 16 de septiembre de 1950, durante su desembarco en Inchon, las tropas yanquis fusilaron en un dia a mas de mil 300 habitantes y en Seul, encarcelaron y mataron a mas de 75 mil patriotas.
					
					 En un ano y pico de guerra, asesinaron en masas en el Sur de Corea a mas de un millon de civiles inocentes. 
					
					 En los territorios de la RPDC ocupados temporalmente, los yanquis asesinaron a los funcionarios de los organos del partido y el Poder y las entidades de masas, obreros, campesinos, empleados, jovenes y ninos escolares, religiosos y otros habitantes inocentes sin distincion de sexos ni edades usando metodos mas barbaros como los de enterrar vivos, quemar, tirar en el rio o el mar, desmembrar, etc.
					
					  Mataron a mas de 4 mil personas en el puente provisional del rio Taedong y sobre el hielo del mismo rio y a mas de 30 mil en la carretera Sariwon-Haeju cuando estas victimas se trasladaban al Sur de Corea enganadas por la amenaza con el uso de bomba atomica.
					
					  Retirandose de zonas de la RPDC ocupados temporalmente desde finales de 1950, los imperialistas yanquis difundieron los microbios de epidemias como viruela para el brote explosivo de esos males.
					
					  En abril de 1951, el numero de los casos de infeccion llego a mas de 3 mil 500 y 10 % de estos pacientes perdieron la vida.
					
					  En el periodo desde la primera decena de enero hasta marzo de 1952, fueron lanzadas en grandes cantidades las bombas bacteriologicas en 804 veces en total contra 169 zonas de la RPDC como altiplanicies y zonas litorales y montanosas.
					
					  En mayo de 1952, EE.UU. mando cada dia centenares de aviones en mision de bombardeo y un cuarto de estos se dedicaba a lanzar bombas bacteriologicas. Algun dia, el numero de las ultimas aeronaves llegaba a mas de 480.
					
					  El uso masivo del gas toxico de EE.UU. comenzo con el bombardeo indiscriminado contra la ciudad de Nampho ocurrido el 6 de mayo de 1951, el cual dejo como saldo mil 379 muertos y lesionados.
					
					  Son incontables los casos de las barbaridades de tropas yanquis que violaron flagrantemente la ley y costumbres de guerra.
					
					  Estos casos no son los accidentales cometidos por algunos soldados sino los criminales perpetrados de modo organizado y planificado segun la politica del gobierno norteamericano.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre campos de construccion de nuevos hospitales
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre campos de construccion de nuevos hospitales
 Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno como va la construccion del Hospital de Pediatria y el Hospital de Estomatologia.
					 Luego de recorrer varios puntos, el convoco la reunion de consulta.
					
					 En la ocasion se hizo enfasis en aumentar la velocidad y la calidad de la construccion en pleno acato al proposito del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de construirlos magnificamente. 
					
					 Se impartieron las tareas para hacer que el Consejo de Ministros, el Comite Estatal de Planificacion, los ministerios y los organos centrales suministren suficientemente las materias primas y materiales necesarios a la construccion.
					
					 Por otra parte, el premier se cercioro del estado de edificacion del Instituto de Setas  de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y el Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu.
					
					 Estimulo a los constructores militares que logran cada dia los exitos superando las condiciones desfavorables.
					
					 Se entero detalladamente del estado de la construccion y subrayo la necesidad de exigir a las unidades vinculadas el suministro de materias primas y materiales necesarios.

articles.title: Inaugurada biblioteca de Instituto Superior de Medicina, adscrito a Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Inaugurada biblioteca de Instituto Superior de Medicina, adscrito a Universidad Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo construida la biblioteca en el Instituto Superior de Medicina de Pyongyang adscrito a Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					 Al recorrer el Instituto en noviembre del 99 (2010) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dio la preciosa instruccion que sirve de guia en la educacion de las generaciones venideras y la investigacion cientifica e hizo levantar la biblioteca moderna.
					
					 Y tomo medidas para asegurar las manos de obra, los materiales y los equipos e indico las vias para acelerar la obra.
					
					 El Mariscal Kim Jong Un tomo las todas medidas por la obra.
					
					 En acato del legado del Dirigente y el proposito del Mariscal, los funcionarios y constructores terminaron magnificamente la obra conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					 Asi que los profesores, empleados y estudiantes llegaron a contar con las condiciones y la base de datos capaces de superar los niveles de punta en la ensenanza, la investigacion cientifica y la curacion preventiva y la universidad, a disponerse de un aspecto como centro de formacion de los hombres talentosos de ciencia medica del pais.
					
					 La biblioteca cuenta con la sala de lectura electronica, la de lectura de multimedias, la de leccion a larga distancia, la de intercambio academico y otras condiciones necesarias a asimilar los conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos de punta.
					
					 La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 19 bajo la participacion del secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Choe Thae Bok y otros funcionarios interesados, asi como los constructores, profesores, empleados y estudiantes del Instituto
